keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm a family man with deep local ties, spanning three generations. I'm the only candidate who will bring back an overnight adult A&E to Ormskirk, protect the NHS, benefits & pensions, rejuvenate our towns, support local business, fight council tax/rates rises & the unjust bedroom tax, reinstate pensioner's travel allowance, safeguard our greenbelt, end hospital parking fees, bring accountability to local government & fight harmful political correctness.

images.caption: Jack Sen for West Lancashire. Standing Up for Real Change
